page.title: 13Leisure and recreation
page.content: In Cranbrook there are quite a few leisure activities for the young and old.Down by one of the estates called the FRYTHE,there is a fair sized swimming pool which requires a season ticket or 50p to get in for two hours. For the older people,there are bowling facilities,just by the primary school and a few climbing frames and swings etc on the ball field,just opposite the school.For children at Cranbrook Grammar school there are two squash courts and anyone who is interested can become a member and there are different leagues depending on how good you are. At Angley school there are badminton sessions and just down the road in Sissinghurst,a tennis court.You can easily obtain membership and take lessons.There is a youth club in the youth wing of Angley school and sometimes discos are held there.
